short_desc: Councilmember Darryl Moore, who represents City Council District 2 in the City of Berkeley, CA.
description: Members of the City Council are elected by district. Councilmembers in Districts 1, 4, 7, and 8 serve until November 30, 2014. Councilmembers in Districts 2, 3, 5, and 6 serve until November 30, 2016.
